title: Parmesan-Roasted Broccoli
directions: Toss broccoli with olive oil, salt, and pepper, and spread out evenly on a baking sheet.
Roast in the oven until the broccoli is tender and lightly browned, about 12 minutes.
Remove from the oven, toss with the cheese, and serve.
ingredients: 1 head broccoli, cut into florets, bottom part of the stem removed
Salt and black pepper to taste
